T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 480000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%' ) or ( d.dept_no ='d002' and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.birth_date > '1965-01-01') or (s.salary > 80000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01') or (de.from_date = t.from_date and de.from_date > '2000-01-01');

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 450000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%' ) or ( d.dept_no ='d002' and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.birth_date > '1965-01-01') or (s.salary > 80000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01') or (de.from_date = t.from_date and de.from_date > '2000-01-01');

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 480000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Al%' ) or ( d.dept_no ='d002' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.birth_date > '1965-01-01') or (s.salary > 80000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01') or (de.from_date = t.from_date and de.from_date > '2000-01-01');

select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,s.from_date,d.dept_no from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date join dept_emp de on de.emp_no = e.emp_no join departments d on de.dept_no = d.dept_no where (e.emp_no > 480000 and t.from_date > '1990-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.last_name like 'Alb%' ) or ( d.dept_no ='d003' and t.from_date > '1996-01-01' and de.from_date > '1996-01-01' and e.birth_date > '1965-01-01') or (s.salary > 79000 and t.from_date > '1996-01-01') or (de.from_date = t.from_date and de.from_date = '2000-01-01');
